description.narrative: Mechanisms established at national and subnational levels to identify, refer, report and intervene to protect children from violations of their rights,which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, especially the most deprived, access and utilize quality and equitable protection, education, health and nutrition services

sector.narrative: Family reunification in emergencies - prevention and response
Services to prevent or respond to gender-based violence in emergencies
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Azerbaijan (Early Childhood Development)
UNICEF Programmes in Azerbaijan (Health and Nutrition)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2017 Azerbaijan: Summative Evaluation of the Access to Justice for Children project
Azerbaijan 2018 Annual Report on Results for Children
Azerbaijan 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Azerbaijan 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Mechanisms established at national and subnational levels to identify, refer, report and intervene to protect children from violations of their rights

description.narrative: Referral network and coordination mechanism in child protection were established with multi-sectoral participation at the three pilot districts. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of children and adults that have access to a safe and accessible channel to report sexual exploitation and abuse [COVIDSitRep]
Existence of Social Service Referral Network for children with multi-sectoral participation at the two pilot districts

actual.value: 2019:The functions and working mechanism of the networks finalized.

title.narrative: Electronic case-management system established and tested

actual.value: 2019:Electronic case management system developed and tested in pilot project.
